title: Stranger’s Handbook - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Aristocracy   Army Building   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Demons   Dragons   Early Romance   Easy Going Life   Elves   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Military   Misunderstandings   Multiple Transported Individuals   Nobles   Polygamy   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sentient Objects   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Tsundere   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: Takkurun   たっくるん
description:
The main character is suddenly summoned to another world…..and the one who shows up next is a malicious and scheming noble…..obey or die. I’ll try to rise in this world and live on by any means! It’s the story of such a hero.

Comedy and serious scenes? I’m the type that won’t let his guard down even when my magical powers are at a cheat level, I take my medicine while scheming wickedly.

Was I only scared of my surroundings in the beginning? Well, I’ll do my best to become an indispensable hero!>
